main.heroTitle: Take immediate action with MicroFire before a fire breaks out
main.heroText: Automatic Fire Extinguisher; When it detects the flame, it activates immediately and extinguishes the fire. It does not harm the environment and equipment.
main.usageText: With its rough surface facing the direction of possible fire risk, the protector of the adhesive tape on the back is removed and adhered parallel to the ground. In vehicles, it is glued to the bodywork, over the battery caps and fuel filter. In electrical panels and electrical clocks, it is adhered to the ceiling on the inner surface of the panel. Separate stickers should be placed on each independent section.

specs.text1: It is an automatic fire extinguisher that can be easily mounted, activates itself upon contact with flames, and extinguishes the fire within seconds. It does not require an electrical source, cable, or pipe connection.
specs.text2: It is compact in size (**100 x 50 x 4 mm**) and weighs **26 ± 1 grams**. It can be stored between **-30°C and +100°C**. The effective extinguishing volume is **0.1 m³ (110 liters)**. One sticker can extinguish a fire inside a cabinet of approximately **50 x 50 x 50 cm** in size.
